entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
